stem: Increasing the электрод-positive (EP) portion of AC (переменный ток) balance in GTAW (TIG) will:

choices.text: Увеличивает oxide cleaning but heat the tungsten more
Уменьшить cleaning and cool the tungsten

rationales.CHOICE-1: More EP enhances cathodic cleaning while raising tungsten temperature.
